name: 4chan - insomnia
description:
Keeps 4chan looking and functioning like 4chan, but it allows for better night time viewing. 
Makes it easier on the eyes when you're up late. 

This userstyle goes great with 4chan's Yotsuba, Yotsuba b, Tomorrow, Photon board styles.
additional_info:
-Mouse over to un-dim images.
-Leaves 4chan landing page intact.

Changelog:

April 13, 2013
-Added wombat-esque syntax highlighting scheme support for [code][/code] tags.


July 16, 2012
-Updated to latest changes, dimmed out unnecessary info a little bit more.

discussions.name: Mostly good except for the catalog
